channel.title: Jagex Ruins Something Else
channel.description:
Runescape has decided the next thing they are going to do is recolour DARK BOWS. Why do they insist on ruining something else that was perfectly good before.. COME ON GUYS COUNT WITH ME.
[b]Jagex Checklist.[/b] [s]1) Ruined wild 2) Ruined PvP 3) Ruined Whip[/s] [s]4) Ruin Dark Bows[/s] 5) Delete all specials for weapons 6) Remove All Bosses 7) Halve all exp rates 8) Turn off dedicated server and make everything run off one small laptop. 9) Make all members able to mute and ban 10) Make PvP members only 11) Make the members only PvP a area where you cant lose items

item.title: Jagex Ruins Something Else
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“DemisePking, post:3, topic:330605”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=426981.msg3135820#msg3135820 date=1266959974]
It’s their choice what they do with their game, if they loose players then it’s their fault. However I like your last few predictions :P.
[/quote]

Im willing to bet money atleast one of those will happen soon.[/quote]

I think you can scratch off dark bow.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Ruins Something Else
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:33, topic:330605”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=426981.msg3136185#msg3136185 date=1266981323]
I don’t see how they would ruin anything by giving you the option to recolor the bow. Not only did the community decide that they wanted the Dark Bow recolored, but it is completely optional whether you want yours recolored…
[/quote]This. This is one of the few replies that didn’t make me want to punch my monitor, such as yours Monokid126, because you guys don’t know the reasoning behind anything you’re talking about.[/quote]

I know the goddamn reasoning i just disagree with the goddamn concept

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Ruins Something Else
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:39, topic:330605”]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Dark_bow/viewitem.ws?obj=11235
So no one will want this update?[/quote]
The only reason the price is jacked so far up is because of merchant clans that know dark bows are going to sell out the ass pretty soon. They went in and bought a ton of dark bows to jack the prices up, then when this update comes out and the dark bow has a huge price, they can sell them and make tons of profit.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Ruins Something Else
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

My question is why do dark bows have to go up 700k? I think that shows that 75% of people WANT their bow recolored. On a side note, I bought a dark bow, I’m hoping it’ll go up, probably hit max the day of the release, then sell that shit… Maybe PK with a bit, idk…

Honestly I think half of this is so JaGex can have some life in the economy…

I’m sure they spent alot of time of the quest “While Guthix Sleeps”, which i believe is actually one of the bests quests in the game and I actually read all of the NPC chat for once… but to see the D claws for only 600k made them sad. So what happened? Jagex decided to add bounty +1 item worlds, So that way you would have D claw and full rune assholes acting like kamikazes and hitting you with the spec then running away, praying you died.

Well, their plan worked, and as their long forgotten about dds went down, the claws went up 30m+
All they want is so people wont be mad at them for trade limit stuff… I’m sure about 30% of the current community doesn’t even remember old wildy…

Essentially, all of the updates that your going to be seeing for the rest of forever are going to pertain to the idea of a constantly moving economy that will be attempted to constantly stabilize to prevent inflation. I’m sure we should be expecting SEVERAL new recolors in items that haven’t been noticed in awhile… don’t be surprised if you see one

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Ruins Something Else
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

Niall:

[quote author=DemisePking link=topic=426981.msg3135808#msg3135808 date=1266959190]8) Turn off dedicated server and make everything run off one small laptop.

Unless the laptop is being used for something else, it will still be dedicated to running runescape.[/quote]

Nah they will be playing solitare on it as well

Lin:

Wow. Your predictions are fucking retarded. You don’t know the story behind half the shit you’re talking about anyway. Their recolors are by player demand, and the dark bow was voted in. Yes, they’re surely ruining the game by listening to what the players want!

The predictions were jokes bro, chillax.

[quote=“cocoa, post:30, topic:330605”][quote author=Mr Mopar link=topic=426981.msg3136624#msg3136624 date=1267045538]
Dark bow recoloring will be win.
[/quote]
No, it’ll be stupid as shit

OFFTOPIC: Hmm, who was recoloring whips and dark bows first?[/quote]

We recoloured whips but im glad nobody went as far as to recolour the dark bow.

[quote=“cocoa, post:7, topic:330605”][quote author=Lin link=topic=426981.msg3135847#msg3135847 date=1266961882]
Wow. Your predictions are fucking retarded. You don’t know the story behind half the shit you’re talking about anyway. Their recolors are by player demand, and the dark bow was voted in. Yes, they’re surely ruining the game by listening to what the players want!
[/quote]
The customer never knows what the fuck they want.[/quote]

This is true.

[quote=“Mitko, post:25, topic:330605”][quote]
4) Ruin Dark Bows
5) Delete all specials for weapons
6) Remove All Bosses
7) Halve all exp rates
8) Turn off dedicated server and make everything run off one small laptop.[/quote]Those will never happen.

Also, [quote]3) Ruined Whip[/quote] They didn’t ruin the whip, you can still have a normal one too, quit complaining. If you don’t like it then just quit.

@xweetok599: i would like you to come up with better ideas.[/quote]

Ik they wont happen fool l2understand minor comedy. Jesus how can you possibley think im serious.

Read full topic
